sidebar.tutorialSidebar.category.Build.description: The label for category Build in sidebar tutorialSidebar

sidebar.tutorialSidebar.category.Build.l.message: There are 2 main modes in The Mirror: Build and Play. Build Mode has the power of a full-blown game engine for whatever you can imagine, developed in real-time with your fellow builders.
sidebar.tutorialSidebar.category.Build.l.description: The generated-index page description for category Build in sidebar tutorialSidebar

sidebar.tutorialSidebar.category.Scripti.description: The label for category Scripting in sidebar tutorialSidebar

sidebar.tutorialSidebar.category.Scripti.message: Bring your games to life with The Mirror's high-level visual scripting. Coding can be daunting, which is why The Mirror provides no-code visual scripting out-of-the-box to make it easy for people of any skill level to build in The Mirror. Visual scripting is still programming, but high-level, and without needing to write code as text. Full support for GDScript is also available if you prefer writing text-based code.
sidebar.tutorialSidebar.category.Scripti.description: The generated-index page description for category Scripting in sidebar tutorialSidebar

sidebar.tutorialSidebar.category.Physics.description: The label for category Physics in sidebar tutorialSidebar

sidebar.tutorialSidebar.category.Physics.message: The Mirror includes Jolt physics, an advanced physics engine. Everything is exposed with a high-level API and is networked out of the box.
sidebar.tutorialSidebar.category.Physics.description: The generated-index page description for category Physics in sidebar tutorialSidebar

sidebar.tutorialSidebar.category.Play.description: The label for category Play in sidebar tutorialSidebar

sidebar.tutorialSidebar.category.Play.li.message: There are 2 main modes in The Mirror: Build and Play. Play Mode is where your published games take flight and can be played by anyone in the world.
sidebar.tutorialSidebar.category.Play.li.description: The generated-index page description for category Play in sidebar tutorialSidebar

sidebar.tutorialSidebar.category.Users.l.message: Showcase your Mirror Image and interact with other people in The Mirror.

sidebar.tutorialSidebar.category.Monetiz.description: The label for category Monetize in sidebar tutorialSidebar

sidebar.tutorialSidebar.category.Monetiz.message: Easily monetize your game with in-Space transactions, buy/sell assets, perks, power-ups, levels, quests, items, skins, and much more
sidebar.tutorialSidebar.category.Monetiz.description: The generated-index page description for category Monetize in sidebar tutorialSidebar
